structure.title: 144: Issuer Information
structure.text:
# 144: Issuer Information

Name of Issuer CATERPILLAR INC. SEC File Number 001-00768 Address of Issuer 5205 N. O'CONNOR BOULEVARD, SUITE 100 IRVING TEXAS 75039 Phone (972) 891-7700 Name of Person for Whose Account the Securities are To Be Sold ANTHONY FASSINO See the definition of "person" in paragraph (a) of Rule 144. Information is to be given not only as to the person for whose account
						the securities are to be sold but also as to all other persons included in that definition. In addition, information shall be given
						as to sales by all persons whose sales are required by paragraph (e) of Rule 144 to be aggregated with sales
						for the account of the person filing this notice. Relationship to Issuer Officer

structure.title: 144: Securities To Be Sold
structure.text:
# 144: Securities To Be Sold

Title of the Class | Date you Acquired | Nature of Acquisition Transaction | Name of Person from Whom Acquired | Is this a Gift? | Date Donor Acquired | Amount of Securities Acquired | Date of Payment | Nature of Payment *
Common | 02/02/2026 | Stock Option Exercise | Issuer |  |  | 10671 | 02/02/2026 | Cash

* If the securities were purchased and full payment therefor was not made in cash at the time of purchase, explain in the table or in a note
			thereto the nature of the consideration given. If the consideration consisted of any note or other obligation, or if payment was made
			in installments describe the arrangement and state when the note or other obligation was discharged in full or the last installment paid.

Furnish the following information as to all securities of the issuer sold during the past 3 months by the person for whose account the securities are to be sold.
structure.summary:
The partial document provides details about a securities sale transaction. The main points covered in the document are:

1. Securities To Be Sold: The specific securities being sold are Common stocks.
2. Acquisition Details: The acquisition was made through a Stock Option Exercise, and the securities were acquired from the Issuer.
3. Quantity of Securities: 10671 units of Common stocks were acquired.
4. Date of Acquisition: The date of acquisition is 02/02/2026.
5. Payment Details: The payment for the securities was made in cash on the same day as the acquisition.
6. Information about previous sales: The document also requests information about any securities of the issuer sold during the past 3 months by the person for whose account the securities are to be sold. However, no such information is provided in the given partial document.

structure.title: 144: Remarks and Signature
structure.text:
# 144: Remarks and Signature

Remarks Date of Notice 02/02/2026 ATTENTION: The person for whose account the securities to which this notice relates are to be sold hereby represents by signing
					this notice that he does not know any material adverse information in regard to the current and prospective
					operations of the Issuer of the securities to be sold which has not been publicly disclosed. If such person has
					adopted a written trading plan or given trading instructions to satisfy Rule 10b5-1 under the Exchange Act, by
					signing the form and indicating the date that the plan was adopted or the instruction given, that person makes
					such representation as of the plan adoption or instruction date. Signature /S/ Anthony D Fassino ATTENTION: Intentional misstatements or omission of facts constitute Federal Criminal Violations (See 18 U.S.C. 1001)
